title: Settings
description: You can make your personal settings and system settings of Şef through this page.

users.title: Users
users.description: Through this page you can add roles to users, edit user profiles and add new ones.
users.name: Name Surname

toasts.success_msg: The user has been created successfully.
toasts.edit_success_msg: The user has been edited successfully.
toasts.error_msg: An error occurred while creating the user.
toasts.edit_error_msg: An error occurred while editing the user.

validation.n_min: Name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.n_max: Name must be at most 50 characters.
validation.name_min: Username must be at least 2 characters.
validation.name_max: Username must be at most 50 characters.
validation.email: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
validation.password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.password_max: Password must be at most 50 characters.

create.title: Add User
create.description: You can create a new user using this window.

edit.title: Edit User
edit.description: You can edit the user's information using this window.

delete.success: The user has been deleted successfully.
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting the user.
delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.subtext: The selected user ({{username}}) will be completely deleted from the Şef system. As a result of this process, you may lose your case data and extension permissions. Do you want to continue?
